SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI

Class Compositor

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.Compositor
public class Compositor extends Object
The Compositor class is responsible for composing and managing various components of the TUI It handles the display of multiple views, including the board, objectives, deck, and player resources.
